definitions.definition: to (cause something to) explode, break, or tear:
examples: His appendix ruptured and he had to be rushed to hospital.

definitions.definition: If you rupture yourself, you break apart the wall of muscle that keeps your stomach and your bowels in place, usually by lifting something too heavy.
an occasion when something explodes, breaks, or tears:
a medical condition in which the wall of muscle holding the stomach and bowels in place inside the body is broken apart:
examples: You're going to give yourself a rupture if you lift that.
